import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function AdminTicket() { const [user, setuser] = useState([]) useEffect(()=> { axios.get('http://localhost:4000/ticketdetails') .then(user=>setuser(user.data)).catch(err=>console.log(err)) },[]) return(
